tool.name: ConvertTSVToTraML
tool.description: Converts an OpenSWATH transition TSV file to a TraML file
tool.command:
ConvertTSVToTraML
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_retentionTimeInterpretation: -algorithm:retentionTimeInterpretation #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_algorithm_retentionTimeInterpretation): "$adv_opts.param_algorithm_retentionTimeInterpretation" #else $adv_opts.param_algorithm_retentionTimeInterpretation #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_override_group_label_check: -algorithm:override_group_label_check #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_algorithm_override_group_label_check): "$adv_opts.param_algorithm_override_group_label_check" #else $adv_opts.param_algorithm_override_group_label_check #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Input OpenSWATH transition TSV file or SpectraST MRM file

param.name: param_algorithm_retentionTimeInterpretation
param.label: How to interpret the provided retention time (the retention time column can either be interpreted to be in iRT, minutes or seconds)

param.name: param_algorithm_override_group_label_check
param.label: Override an internal check that assures that all members of the same PeptideGroupLabel have the same PeptideSequence (this ensures that only different isotopic forms of the same peptide can be grouped together in the same label group)
param.help: (-override_group_label_check) Only turn this off if you know what you are doing

tool.help:
Converts an OpenSWATH transition TSV file to a TraML file
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_ConvertTSVToTraML.html
